backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing eligibility checks, community profile management with supporterOfCommunity flag, mentor browsing, and photo upload using authorization and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old CommunityProfile records to the new format by adding supporterOfCommunity with default false.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping supporterOfCommunity-related frontend changes to corresponding files, components, and requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing routing, pages, hooks, components, and supporterOfCommunity feature additions.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions including light/dark butterfly-themed OKLCH color palette and base resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with metadata and butterfly-themed favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup defining public and authenticated routes wrapped in AppShell with authentication and eligibility gating.
frontend/src/backendExtensions.d.ts: TypeScript module augmenting backend interface with future post, comment, and report types and endpoints.
frontend/src/components/auth/AgeGate.tsx: Age verification page requiring 18+ confirmation and triggering eligibility confirmation via backend.
Layout wrapper providing authenticated navigation, themed background, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/nav/AuthedNav.ts: Authenticated navigation bar with links, admin-specific items, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Manages avatar and profile photo uploads, previews, validation, removal, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity auth to expose login state and a logout function that clears cached queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for storing, loading, and managing Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for eligibility, profiles, directory browsing, contacts, and reporting using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables for the UI palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/Connections.tsx: Placeholder page displaying a UI card for future connection management features.
frontend/src/pages/Directory.tsx: Mentor directory page with filters for mentoring, mentorship, and community supporters, fetching and displaying profiles.
frontend/src/pages/Feed.tsx: Community feed placeholder showing upcoming posting features and disabled post creation UI.
frontend/src/pages/Guidelines.tsx: Static community guidelines page outlining rules for respect, safety, community building, and reporting.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Public landing page with hero section, login CTA, and feature overview for the platform.
frontend/src/pages/Moderation.tsx: Moderation panel that checks admin status and displays either an access denial or placeholder moderation tools.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetail.tsx: Placeholder page for viewing a post and its comments until backend integration is complete.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileMe.tsx: User profile setup and editing page that loads, edits, validates, and saves community profile data.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileView.tsx: Renders a user profile page, loads profile data, displays avatar and details, and allows sending connection requests.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, and current state of the Butterfly Connections platform.
